> 

TWRLS is real <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr>

Hi guys,

Can you please, please, please, tell me how to use spawn marker? i tried rotating it in every possible directions but still my rocket flips upside down when launched from LC-41... RIP to my slim, trim and cute rockets...!!!

Hey [@Tristonwilson12](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/136353-tristonwilson12/)! I just somehow made a old LC-41/40 tower from @Raidernick's US rockets pack into a static! You could try changing the .cfg file I made so in the KK menu it doesn't just say blank. So please feel free to change whatever you want in my file.[Download Here!](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B1hhT1SQsXjZRnA2Z3k5VklxZ2c)
